 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁרְשְׁרָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** (in spite of following suffix masculine [[Exod.28.14|Exod 28:14]], [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:135o»§ 135o</sup> [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xv (1895), 316, xvi (1896), 96</sup>) ==chain== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šaršarratu***</u></abbr>, ***chain, fetter***; Mishna <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁרְשָׁרוֺת‎</span>, Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁרְשׁוּרָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***chain*** or ***rope*** of palm-leaves, etc., but also Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְשֶׁלֶת‎</span> ***chain***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁישְׁלָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, see Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">], (connection with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁר‎</span> denied by [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>B88W 56 Anm. 9</sup>)); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁרְשְׁרוֺת‎</span>, absolute [[1Kgs.7.17|1Kgs 7:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹת‎</span>- absolute [[2Chr.3.15|2Chr 3:15]], construct [[Exod.28.14|Exod 28:14]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁרְשֹׁת‎</span> v[[Exod.28.22|Exod 28:22]] (either abbreviated or textual error); — ***chains*** of gold, like wreaths, attached to ephod [[Exod.28.14|Exod 28:14]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.28.22|Exod 28:22]]; [[Exod.39.15|Exod 39:15]] ornaments on pillars at porch of temple [[1Kgs.7.17|1Kgs 7:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּדִלִים מַעֲשֵׂה שׁ‎</span>), \|\| [[2Chr.3.15|2Chr 3:15]]; [[2Chr.3.16|2Chr 3:16]] (twice in verse).
